SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class manages the player in the game, giving to the Game class the information about who is playing. Every player has a private space (one-to-one relation) in the game, called private board, which displays the cards played by the owner player. The game can start only if there are from 2 to 4 players. Every player has got a game piece, named Token. Lastly, a player has a specific aim to reach, represented by the aim card

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, Game game, AimCard privateAim)
      Constructor for Player class, which creates and initializes the attributes for a new player. The parameters which are not taken in input are set on default value
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the player (usually received from controller)
      game - as reference of Game in which the player is playing
      privateAim - as reference of the private aim card
